Package Models

package Models
  • Class
    Description
    Advance
    Implemented Command pattern.
    AdvanceTest
    This class is used to test functionality of Advance order.
    Airlift
    The execute and validation of Airlift is handle by this class.
    AirliftTest
    This class is used to test the functionalities of Airlift class methods.
    Blockade
    This blockade class is used to neutral one of the territories of the player and triplet the number of armies on that territory.
    BlockadeTest
    This class is used to test the functionalities of Airlift class methods.
    Bomb
    When player use this Bomb card on target country then target country will lose half of their armies.
    BombTest
    This class is used to test the functionalities of Bomb class methods.
    Card
    This interface handles all the card that player can have
    Continent
    Model class that manages all the continents on the provided map.
    ContinentTest
    This ContinentTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Continent file
    Country
    Model class that manages all the countries on the provided map.
    CountryTest
    This CountryTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Country file
    Deploy
    Implemented Command pattern.
    DeployTest
    This CountryTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Country file
    Diplomacy
    This class is used to handle Diplomacy command
    DiplomacyTest
    This class is used to test the functionalities of Diplomacy class methods.
    GameState
    Model class to manage the GameState functions
    IssueOrderPhase
    Implementation of Issue Order Phase class for GamePlay using State Pattern.
    LogEntryBuffer
    The class records and stores logs for different phases of the game
    Map
    Model class to manage the uploaded maps
    MapTest
    This MapTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Mapservice file
    Order
    This Class handles command which is given by the player.
    OrderExecutionPhase
    Order Execution Phase implementation for the game using State Pattern.
    OrderExecutionPhaseTest
    This class is used to test the functionalities of OrderExecutionPhase class methods.
    OrderTest
    This Ordertest class file is used to test some important functionalities of order file
    Phase
    This abstract class declares abstract methods for each game phase
    Player
    This class depicts the player information and services.
    PlayerTest
    Test cases to validate functionality of player class
    StartUpPhase
    Implementation of Startup Phase class for GamePlay using State Pattern.
